## HSL.brightness property

Brightness

Returns a number between 0 and 255 the current color (not taking into account the alpha level). The higher the number the brighter the color.

https://24ways.org/2010/calculating-color-contrast

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly brightness: number;
```
